text: Raimund Hoghe (12 May 1949 – 14 May 2021) was a German choreographer, dancer, filmmaker, journalist, and author who wrote profiles of persons, both prominent and outsider, for Die Zeit. From 1980 to 1990, he was a dramaturge and chronicler of Pina Bausch's Tanztheater before he worked independently. He is regarded as "one of the protagonists of German contemporary dance theatre". He lived in Düsseldorf, where he died on 14 May 2021, two days after his 72nd birthday. Category:Choreographers Category:German journalists Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Raimund Hoghe
